Welcome to a world of collaboration and infinite opportunity.

Global Music Industry Directory with advanced search facilities

An online directory of publicists, recording studios, writers, session musicians, social media marketing professionals, videographers, music lawyers, publishers. (and more)

A Music Industry Marketplace and Payment Portal

Music industry professionals will create and list services through the platforms integrated marketplace.

A Music Industry Social Network

Connect and interact with musicians and professionals through a social network built around music.

Advanced AI integration

AI integration will shape the users marketplace and social experience. Analysing a range of available user stats (external social stats, music streams etc) the platform will provide a seamless, customised front end experience.

Toolkits

Cosound V2 will provide intuitive tools for musicians, AI integration will give clear roadmaps and suggestions on how to reach the next checkpoint.

An A&R Engine

Cosound V2 will create an unrivalled database designed to scrub acoustic fingerprints against user engagements to determine potentially successful songs.

Artist Development
